DataElement.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Pathologic Lymphadenopathy Assessment Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator for iInformation related to a pathologic finding indicating lymphadenopathy (one or more lymph nodes are enlarged).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Pathologic Lymphadenopathy Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to a pathologic finding indicating lymphadenopathy (one or more lymph nodes are enlarged).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: Caused by or altered by or manifesting disease or pathology.:A clinical finding indicating that a lymph node is enlarged. Causes include viral and bacterial infections and cancers that affect the lymph nodes.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Caused by or altered by or manifesting disease or pathology.
An enlarged lymph node. Causes include viral and bacterial infections and cancers that affect the lymph nodes.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
